title: Pear, chicory and Roquefort salad
ingredients: ['25 g (1 oz) walnut halves', '2 pears', '3 heads chicory, or 1 large head radicchio', '80 g (3 oz) Roquefort cheese', 'For the dressing', '1 teaspoon clear honey', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar or cider vinegar']
